sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 門市接近古鎮公園，離我門市大年夜約300米距離。

sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 門市接近古鎮公園，離我門市大年夜約300米距離。

sentences.english: And we spent the night at a five-star hotel in Jiangmen city.
sentences.chinese: 我們在江門市一家五星級酒店過了夜。

sentences.english: Can I pick up my Corporate Purchase at my eslite bookstore?
sentences.chinese: 可以到誠品書店的門市去取企業團購的商品嗎？

sentences.english: What position do you hold? I'm in charge of the sales department.
sentences.chinese: 你的職位是什麼？我負責管理門市部。

sentences.english: Company is located in Tianfeng machinery area, Huli District, Xiamen City, Fujian, China.
sentences.chinese: 公司位於中國福建廈門市湖裏區天豐機械城。

sentences.english: This sales department of a dress company is an authentic-fashion metropolis .
sentences.chinese: 服裝公司門市部，真正的時裝之都。

sentences.english: In the hill wholesale market wholesale retail sales underwear, has the independent retail sales.
sentences.chinese: 在小山批發市場批發零售內衣，有獨立門市。

sentences.english: Market in Beijing has been operating for 8 years, has a retail outlet in Weifang.
sentences.chinese: 在北京市場已經經營8年時間，在濰坊設有門市部。

sentences.english: Fai Che Food Product is at South Gate Market.
sentences.chinese: 快車食品系晌南門市場入面。

sentences.english: You can find dumpling skins in the refrigerated section of Asian stores.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在亞洲門市的冷藏部找到餃子皮。

sentences.english: Liu Liqiao days shops in the city-Hardware & Electrical.
sentences.chinese: 門市部設在六裏橋天雲五金機電城內。

sentences.english: The project of large frame overhead cross constructed by jacking method in Xianyue Road, Xiamen City has some unique characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 廈門市仙嶽路大型頂進框架立交橋工程具有一些特點。

sentences.english: For part of healthy population in this city, peripheral blood was collected for testing of measles antibodies.
sentences.chinese: 對江門市部分健康人羣抽取外周血進行麻疹抗體檢測。

sentences.english: Art work Cultivate won the creative prize in the 2nd Xiamen art Exhibition in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年作品《耕》獲第二屆廈門市羣鷺獎創作獎。

sentences.english: 08 took a temporary post as Mayor Assistant of Xiamen, Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 1995年8月起在福建省廈門市掛職任市長助理。
